DOC.brief_summary: TransitionCHF aim recruit unique cohort patient asymptomatic leave ventricular dysfunction ( NYHA I ) study progression symptomatic ( > NYHA I ) HF identify parameters/ biomarkers promote predict individual risk transition . Results TransitionCHF Cohort Study inform refine current treatment guideline . The implementation common patient data set biobanking standard enable data biomaterial share DZHK study group . This study set standard unique DZHK heart failure database Biobank innovative preclinical clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: TransitionCHF Systolic Dysfunction Congestive Heart Failure Cohort Study
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic systolic dysfunction ( define : ejection fraction < 40 % echocardiography MRI ; document within last 3 month prior baseline visit ) No history hospitalization heart failure ( define hospitalisation symptom heart failure require initiation therapy loop diuretic escalation preexist loop diuretic therapy within 48 hour hospital admission ) No heart failure symptom ( NYHA II , III IV ) upon inclusion 6MWD ≥ 80 % reference value Written inform consent Age ≥ 18 year Symptomatic heart failure ( NYHA > I ) baseline visit Any significant valvular disease ( > 2nd degree ) Severe pulmonary disease ( e. g. FEV1 < 70 % normal limit ) Severe renal disease ( GFR < 15 ml/min ) ejection fraction baseline visit ≥ 50 % echocardiography MRI Life expectancy < 1 year Pericardial disease Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy Myocardial infarction within last 3 month Planned cardiac surgical intervention within 3 month inclusion Geographical reason ( e. g. patient live outside Germany planning move abroad ) Inability give inform consent ( e. g. mental disorder ) Therapy loop diuretic ( e. g. torasemide , furosemide , piretanide )
